Html:
Thanks for all the great work Yves.  I have a situation where my university expects the following: 

First time contributor(s) are cited in thesis: (Smith, Smith and Smith, 2011)

Second time contributors are cited in thesis (Smith, et al., 2011)

Any ideas on how to do that I have been using Harvard Leeds as the basis for my changes, but I just cannot work out how to do this.

Regards,

Sean

Sorry, I have found the answer to my question:  It is impossible to do.

http://bibword.codeplex.com/discussions/231791
